title: Salvation
description: Lexa These feelings I have for Ben can’t go anywhere. I’m the Angels Halo MC president’s daughter. And he is the sheriff.  For both our sakes, I have to keep him away.   Ben Lexa calms the rage that I’ve struggled with my entire life. I couldn’t care less who her father is. Nothing matters but making her mine.  Because my broken beauty is where my salvation begins.    ***You can read the Prelude to Salvation in Love, Loyalty & Mayhem: A Motorcycle Club Romance Anthology—out July 16th—before Salvation releases!***
author: Terri Anne Browning
